attributes.action: No means testing on winter fuel allowance and free bus passes for pensioners
attributes.additional_details:
Pensioners of the country have worked hard and have earned to Wright to have there winter fuel allowance and free bus passes.what do we call rich pensioners in my view somebody who has a million pound in the bank not a pensioner
Who has savings and a second pension. Some body has to stick up for our pensioners and I'm going to do it end of.We have make sure George Osborne backs down on this issue
